Ridgeline International| Software Developers | Onsite | Tysons Corner | Virginia

Ridgeline is the 4th fastest growing company in the Greater Washington Area. We are looking for an experienced Software developer with an interest in tinkering with hardware and a strong desire to learn new skills. The job requires pairing a hardware device with backend software to send data in a secure fashion. A small amount of hardware design and soldering may be required as well as familiarity with Java back end services.

Skills: Linux CLI, Java, Angular, Angular Android Mobile Development (Java), Java Spring Boot (API), Java Script, ELK stack

Apply here: https://chp.tbe.taleo.net/chp04/ats/careers/v2/viewRequisiti...

For questions please email gchao@ridgelineintl.com with your resume.

Thank you.
